text: I wish there is a navy on the tote!
we're taking notes
the tote is super cute! Hopefully will receive it before my upcoming trip. Will definitely order each color if there are other color options in the future!
me too!!
yes. Light colored travel bags don’t work as well for me either. But it is super cute!
See you next week looking forward to hopefully collecting some pilot trading cards I dont have!
Jerry Kalfrat Jerry?
Hai dear there are enemies in telangana
Congratulations for 100 Years and another hundred more to go.

I received a Delta Olympic package full of goodies. Love the shoulder bag that was included but wish it was just a bit smaller. I Love the Blanket and have had flight attendants offer me money for it.

So disappointed in Delta when somebody else bought my daughter and my ticket from Expedia and got economy. Since i have a bad back, I thought no problem I will just pay to upgrade like I have done on AAirlines. Delta says you have to go through Expedia. Expedia says you have to go through Delta for seat changes and upgrades. Seems crazy that Delta will not take my money for a simple upgrade.

Hello ,we are deeply sorry for making you feel that way, it was never our intention but we would like to closely look at the concern raised. Please DM your reachable Whatsapp number we connect you with an agent who can assist. Thank you
never book through Expedia. Customer service is nonexistent and Delta Air Lines is correct. The ticket was not bought from them.

I should not have to worry about baggage handlers and security stealing from my checked luggage. After waiting almost a month after filing the claim, I get a response stating that my claim is denied!! This is a complete violation and Delta’s response is embarrassing and irresponsible.
Their not what they used to be!
for standing firm on diversity! As a consumer I’m choosing to spend my money with companies who align with my morals and values!!!!
Absolutely and utterly disgraceful that Delta limits a 2 million customer and who has diamond status and has Reserve card (~$600/yr) to 15 Sky Club visits per year.
I am beyond done with Delta. Worst managed frequent flyer program I have ever used. "missing Miles" with no support is a joke.
Hi we apologise for the inconvenience caused. Please note that we have already escalated this matter to the relevant department, kindly share your reachable WhatsApp number for assistance.
really?

Same here I'm paying for miles and lounge access. That would be nice to not have to chose from access. Remember Delta the major people flying your airlines are middle class and would like a bit more than what is offered. Just something to think about.

Hello ,we are deeply sorry for making you feel that way, it was never our intention but we would like to closely look at the concern raised. Please DM your reachable Whatsapp number we connect you with an agent who can assist. Thank you
You’re buying miles?

Restricting club access is a big mistake. One huge benefit of club access is that people show up early to the airport which streamlines traffic checking in security etc. Shame on you and I will now consider my options to change my prefered airline.
Delta my favorite airline congratulations for 100 years
Ummmmm bring back access to your lounge with your Delta SkyMiles AMEX card
I have the platinum card , I’d like access to the Sky Club again.
u have access if it’s just the Amex platinum you don’t have it if you have the Amex platinum delta
I do have the Amex platinum Delta.
if you upgrade to either the delta amex reserve (the purple card) or the regular amex plat, you’ll have sky club access. I know it’s confusing!
Ok thank you I’ll look into that.

Josh Vincent I would much rather get miles on my purchases than have access to sky clubs so the regular platinum doesn’t work for me. I do have the purple one and love ALL the benefits and how I earn Delta Skymiles Platinum status with the purple card.

We find the Reserve (purple) card well worth it. It pays for itself in Sky Club visits, the annual companion ticket offers more opportunities than the platinum card, there are restaurant and Uber perks as well.
The issue was , they didn't allow my daughter and my wife to travel back home for 31 days, lack of knowledgethat they used to be Filipinos under balikbayan program can stay at least one year.

Very disappointed with how our lost baggage was handled. You lost our car seat and we were forced to purchase a replacement with a promise the original would arrive the next day. It’s been over two months and we haven’t seen it. Now you won’t reimburse us for the seat you lost but only the replacement. Now you won’t reply to any of my emails
Hello! Due to privacy concerns, please click on the link to start a private conversation. https://m.me/125472670805257
I just wanted to say this, thank you for being our voice
My favorite airline! I always bring my crews gifts when I’m aboard!!
No longer fly Delta and will cancel my delta American Express card due to your stance on DEI
Congrats on the anniversary! We have 7-8 trips booked with DL this year--always our first choice. Appreciate the service we receive. And, I'll hope those travel hoodies are back in stock soon!
I bought one of the Mile High shirts
All the sister wives are getting the matching skirts. Carrie Robyn Kristin Wood
no doubt with coordinating garters
Absolutely. We need to schedule your fitting and verify the measurements. There was too much detail in those pictures you sent
I lost my Dr. Pepper reading this, Jack
I wish there was a way to get one of the pride shirts that yall wear in parades. They’re always so cool!
Beyond disgusted with Delta.. stranded my niece and 3 children in Boston today and absolutely no one at the counter to help them. It has got to be illegal...

Delta has been my go to airline for several years but this year they’ve pretty well priced themselves out of line. Am now having to go back to Southwest for domestic and British Airways for international. $868 v $469 economy to Las Vegas and $4400 v $2750 (premium) per single round trip ticket to the Mediterranean this year… at least last year it was half way reasonable, but no longer. Very disappointed
Thank you for your continued support of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion! Happy to fly Delta!
Great celebrating 100 years and many more

Can't feel happy for their celebration since they don't care about travelers with disabilities. Delta staff member insulted my mother's condition and lied to their boss. Good thing I got video footage. Very disappointed Delta airlines
Any Northwest Airlines merchandise?
Love DL. Many great flights in past.
Thank you for a good flight today !
Congratulations. What a great honor it would be for Delta to reinstate the few remaining Flying Colonels!

Worse airline customer service
Spoke to you and emailed back and forth useless
You destroyed our luggage and here nothing but bull s. T

I know snow and airport closures are not your fault but you shoukd at least compensate me for my losses
Hi! Thank you for contacting . We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you have experienced. We appreciate you for reaching out to us. Please send us a DM so that we can promptly assist you.
I got into contact with someone and I have been helped

Maybe you’ll answer if I comment on social media. Why does it take so long to have miles reflect in your account? I flew from PIT—LIB on January 18th and back on the 25th. Called and then chatted in about it, and still, no miles. My American miles I did after the fact reflected right away. Just odd.
Hello, It's unfortunate for the challenge encountered. We would like to closely took at the concern raised. Please, share with us via DM your phone number to allow us probe further.
kindly check your messages for assistance
I’ve stopped flying Delta. I want qualified pilots not DEI hires.
oh good grief! I’m so pleased I won’t encounter you on any delta flights.
I am pretty sure you have absolutely zero education, but you still want to cry about qualified people getting a job.
So great, that Delta will stay with the DEI program, congratulations fro a tourism professional from Germany.
Your boarding process is by far the worst. Southwest is by far better. Whoever came up with this process should be terminated. So should whoever approved it

I am writing to formally demand compensation for what can only be described as an absolute disaster of a travel experience on 03/10 and 03/11 2025. From the moment I arrived at the airport, your airline subjected me to a series of unacceptable failures, culminating in the loss of my luggage and a delayed arrival at my final destination.
we have responded to your private message to provide some suggestions to help with the verification procedure.

The best thing Delta can do from my point of view is to terminate the CEOs employment with Delta… In my experience in my opinion he is the worst CEO Delta has ever had and I have been with Delta for almost ￼ five decades ever since they bought out Northwest Airlines. Delta CEO has ruined the skyMile program, has reduced the quality of food on their airline, and even start a serving imitation alcohol such as something that’s supposed to replace Baileys. How stupid. ￼ I could go on and on with the stupid decisions the executives of Delta have made since ￼ they hired their new CEO… My opinion

I have four years and nothing gets done… For an example, I’m a diamond medallion with nearly 3,000,000 sky miles that are worthless because of the new program your CEO implemented… So stop providing me the corporate talking points
I am not familiar with the CEO, but from what you’re saying it seems his attitude is trickle down to all their employees.
yes, his employees have a negative view of him and his executive staff. I’m also a stock holder I wish I could get him terminated for how he has ruined Delta
you are a broken record. Same comments from you no matter the post’s topic. Really you’re griping about the kind of alcohol available?
Then quit flying Delta since clearly you’ll never be satisfied.
Delta customer forever. Thank you for sticking to your values and keeping DEI programs. DEI programs make America stronger and better.

I AM LOOKING FOR A REFUND OR ECREDIT FOR COMFORT + , ICHANGED MY FLIGHT AND WAS NOT ABLE TO GET COMFORT + AND HAD TO SIT AND SUFFER IN MAIN CABIN , I PAID FOR A REFUNDABLE TICKET , WHY CAN I NOT GET A REFUND IF I CHANGED MY RESERVATION TO A DIFFERENT CITY IN THE SAME COUNTRY, HOW UNFAIR AND WHAT AN ABSURD RULE, WHERE IS YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE DELTA. EVEN AN ECREDIT FOR FUTURE FLIGHTS WOULD BE ACCETABLE. BUYERS BEWARE!! DELTA NEEDS TO CHANGE THIS AND REFUND PASSENGERS IF THEY CHANGE RESERVATION TO MAIN IF NO COMFORT AVAILABLE- VOLUNTARY OR INVOLUNTARY - P E R I O D !!
Red as well pls.

Congratulations

Congratulations

I paid a LOT of money to fly direct 5 people plus an infant from Atl to Eagle/vail. Due to some computer “glitch”, we find ourselves in Salt Lake City. With tired hungry babies. Thank you for the vouchers HOWEVER one of the six did NOT work. It also doesn’t include gratuity. The infant still needed juice fruit Mac n cheese or whatever we could find for her. We are out of extra diapers due to this unexpected layover. Thank you for the bonus miles BUT it doesn’t compare to the inconvenience we are suffering and the huge expense for a direct flight. Please do better delta. Any compensation is appreciated. We aren’t gonna very disappointed. We also had dinner reservations in Vail with family that we will not be able to make. Of delta doesn’t fly direct into Eagle vail from Salt Lake, I am not sure why we are here.

Delta is a scam they pulled the same scam on us two times in a row claiming oh there's bad weather at the arrival destination we have to delay your flight they deleted three separate times for a total of three and a half hours later causing us to miss our connecting flight which in turn cause them to rebook us on a different flight but put us in the last row of the main cabin although we have a first class ticket for the entire trip and they offer no reimbursement at all. If that wasn't bad enough.. they're doing the exact same scam on the return leg of the trip oh we have to delay the flight now we have to do it again bad weather at the gaining Airport don't worry we'll rebook you and then rebook first class passengers in coach and tell you there's nothing they can do about it because it's the weather is out of their control that's the scam that Delta is now pulling
I’m so disappointed in the service and lack of communication. Poor decisions left us stranded in Atlanta instead of making to our final destination. You have lost my business in the future!
I wish you had more Delta trinkets and glassware but this stuff is great as well. Since you are taking notes, I thought I would throw that in there. Congrats on 100 years
Some things are already sold out in 52 mins! Wow! Glad I got my order in!

I love my job! I love Delta Air Lines! 100 more years!

our very first flight beginning of our vacation was going to be delayed which meant we were going to miss our connecting so they booked us on American Airlines and we’re standing in line getting ready to get on our plane and we double check and noticed that we’re still going to miss our connecting so we had to get out of the line and go back to the Delta desk and have them change it again making us three hours late from our original arrival!! if we hadn’t noticed it, we would’ve been stuck in Phoenix overnight??? then on our way home the first flight was normal no problems, second flight delayed, of course, and we already had a three hour layover!!
 NEVER FLY DELTA!!!
Just love all you do!!
Happy 100 years!!

Absolutely hate when the overhead storage for MY seat row I paid for is full. I had to go further back to find space for my carry on. Then fight through the line of people still boarding to get back to my seat. Now landing and have to go backwards for my carry on. Completely dysfunctional and held up the boarding process. Why can’t airlines make this a rule? Each seat has its own overhead spot.
